name: Fuzzy Flyer
description:
Run, climb, and glide your way through forest and sky in this cute and whimsical endless runner! Help our little squirrel friend migrate to avoid the changing seasons and rising predators, and someday arrive in a land where acorns are abundant and the forest is safe :)

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Features:

  • Energy bar
    • Keep your energy up by eating nuts and insects!
  • Predators
    • Watch out for hungry racoons and keep clear of preying owls…
  • Mobility
    • Choose to run, climb, or glide - it’s up to you!
  • Game stages
    • The further you run, the faster it gets!

------------------------------------------------------------------------
